channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Db2U
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Db2U

item.title: CVE-2022-41297|2024-08-03T12:42:44.995Z -- ibm -- db2u
item.description: IBM Db2U 3.5, 4.0, and 4.5 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 237212.

item.title: CVE-2022-41296|2024-08-03T12:42:45.776Z -- ibm -- db2u
item.description: IBM Db2U 3.5, 4.0, and 4.5 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 237210.
